# Solar Physics Division Meeting 2021

* [AAS/SPD 2021 website](https://aas.org/meetings/aas238)
* Covering key new functionality for the recently released SunPy 3.0
* 4 June 2021

## The notebooks

(replace the binder notebook badge)

[![badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/binder-launch-579ACA.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://mybinder.org/v2/gh/sunpy/tutorial-notebooks/master?filepath=2019_spd%2Fsunpy-1.0-spd2019-intro.ipynb)

There are three notebooks. In order of presentation,

1. [data-download.ipynb](#)
2. [data-structures.ipynb](#)
3. [coordinates.ipynb](#)

## Links and References
* [https://sunpy.org](https://sunpy.org)
* Full documentation [https://docs.sunpy.org](https://docs.sunpy.org) (hosted on readthedocs, all releases)
* Mailing list [https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/sunpy](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/sunpy)
* Weekly open meetings (Wed at noon ET, [https://meet.jit.si/sunpy](https://meet.jit.si/sunpy))
* Chatroom [https://riot.im/app/#/room/#sunpy:openastronomy.org](https://riot.im/app/#/room/#sunpy:openastronomy.org)
